author: Susan
title: Susan
text: I returned two tops I purchased online to the store, and was incorrectly informed that items purchased online via paypal had to be returned by post. I returned the items at a cost of â‚¬5, and found out afterwards from a colleague that this is not true, that she has returned items to the store even though they were purchased via paypal.
